template.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
template.title: Identifier or synonym --> Database object.
template.comment: This is the template that the quick search runs. If the name is changed it also has to be changed for the quick search configuration - Rachel. Removed tags so no longer displayed - just used for quick search now. Rachel.

query.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
query.view: Synonym.subject.primaryIdentifier Synonym.subject.secondaryIdentifier Synonym.subject.symbol Synonym.value Synonym.subject.sgdAlias Synonym.subject.organism.name
query.longDescription: Find an entry in the database using any identifier or synonym.

template.name: AllGene_ChromosomalFeatures
template.title: All genes in organism --> All Chromosomal Features

query.name: AllGene_ChromosomalFeatures
query.view: SequenceFeature.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.featureType SequenceFeature.secondaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.description SequenceFeature.sgdAlias
query.longDescription: Retrieve all chromosomal features for the reference genome of S. cerevisiae.
query.constraintLogic: (A or B or C or D or E or F or G or H or I or J or K or L or M or N or O or P or Q or R or S or X or Y or Z) and T and U and (V or W)

constraint.value: not in systematic sequence of S288C

query.name: AllGenes_Topic_Literature
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.organism.shortName Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.pubMedId Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.citation Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.title Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.journal Gene.publicationAnnotations.literatureTopics.name
query.longDescription: Show all genes associated with a certain topic.

query.name: ChromosomeRegion_AllGenes
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.organism.shortName Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes located within the specified chromosome and coordinate range.
query.constraintLogic: (A or B) and C and D and E and (F or G) and I

constraint.value: not in systematic sequence of S288C

query.name: Chromosome_AllFeatures
query.view: SequenceFeature.chromosome.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.featureType SequenceFeature.secondaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.description SequenceFeature.sgdAlias
query.longDescription: Retrieve all feature types for the specified chromosome.
query.constraintLogic: (A or B or C or D or E or F or G or H or K or L or M or N or O or P or Q or R or S or I or J or V or W) and T and U and X

query.name: Chromosome_Gene
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.symbol Gene.sgdAlias Gene.qualifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.description Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes located on a specified chromosome.
query.constraintLogic: A and (B or C) and (D or E)

query.name: Chromosome_Gene_1
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.sgdAlias Gene.description Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.status Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes located on a specified chromosome.
query.constraintLogic: A and (B or C) and (D or E) and F

template.name: Chromosome_Gene_FeatureType
template.title: Chromosome-->Genes of a selected Feature Type

query.name: Chromosome_Gene_FeatureType
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve features located on chromosome.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and (C or D) and (E or F)

query.name: Chromosome_IntergenicSequence
query.view: IntergenicRegion.primaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.length IntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.start IntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.end IntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.strand IntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.primaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.secondaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.symbol
query.longDescription: Retrieve all intergenic regions (with their chromosomal locations and lengths) for a specified chromosome.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.value: not in systematic sequence of S288C

query.name: Chromosome_Telomeres
query.view: Telomere.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Telomere.primaryIdentifier Telomere.secondaryIdentifier Telomere.featureType Telomere.organism.shortName Telomere.chromosomeLocation.start Telomere.chromosomeLocation.end Telomere.chromosomeLocation.strand Telomere.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve telomeres and telomeric regions on a specified chromosome.

query.name: Complex_Participant_Details
query.view: Complex.name Complex.identifier Complex.systematicName Complex.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Complex.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Complex.publications.pubMedId Complex.function Complex.properties Complex.allInteractors.participant.primaryIdentifier Complex.allInteractors.participant.secondaryIdentifier Complex.allInteractors.participant.symbol Complex.allInteractors.stoichiometry Complex.allInteractors.type Complex.allInteractors.biologicalRole
query.longDescription: For a given macromolecular complex, retrieve Gene Ontology annotations and references for the complex as a whole; also retrieve the subunits of the complex, their stoichiometry, and their biological roles in the complex.

template.name: Disease_Human_Yeast
template.title: OMIM Disease Phenotype --> human gene(s) --> yeast homolog(s)

query.name: Disease_Human_Yeast
query.view: Disease.name Disease.identifier Disease.genes.symbol Disease.genes.name Disease.genes.primaryIdentifier Disease.genes.crossReferences.identifier Disease.genes.homologues.homologue.symbol Disease.genes.homologues.homologue.secondaryIdentifier Disease.genes.homologues.homologue.name Disease.genes.homologues.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Specify OMIM phenotype(s) (by keyword or name) and retrieve all associated human gene(s) and the yeast homologs of these gene(s).
query.constraintLogic: B and C and D and A

query.name: Domain_Protein_Gene
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.secondaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.name Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.description Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.interpro.name Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.interpro.description Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.description Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.start Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.end Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.evalue Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.method
query.longDescription: Retrieve Proteins/Genes that have a given domain.

query.name: FeatureType_Gene
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.organism.shortName Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes of a selected feature type.
query.constraintLogic: (A or B) and C and (D or E) and F

template.name: FeatureType_SequenceFeature
template.title: Feature Type --> Features of a selected feature Type

query.name: FeatureType_SequenceFeature
query.view: SequenceFeature.primaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.secondaryIdentifier SequenceFeature.symbol SequenceFeature.sgdAlias SequenceFeature.description SequenceFeature.featureType
query.longDescription: Retrieve all chromosomal features of a selected feature type.
query.constraintLogic: Q and T and U and (V or W)

template.name: GOID_Gene
template.title: GO ID --> Genes.
template.comment: which also have a 'with' annotation (The 'with' field holds an additional identifier for annotations using certain evidence codes)

query.name: GOID_Gene
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.sgdDbXrefId Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.withText
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes annotated to a particular GO ID with a particular evidence code.

template.name: GOSlimTerm_FeatureType_Gene
template.title: GO SlimTerm-->Genes of a selected Feature Type

query.name: GOSlimTerm_FeatureType_Gene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.organism.shortName Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.annotType Gene.qualifier
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes of a selected feature type that are annotated to a selected GO Slim term and children of that selected GO Slim Term. Only manually curated and high-throughput GO annotations are included.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and (C or D) and (E or F) and (G or H) and (I or J)

template.name: GOTerm_GeneOrganism
template.title: GO Term name [and children of this term] -->All genes

query.name: GOTerm_GeneOrganism
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.annotType Gene.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.citation
query.longDescription: Retreive all genes that are annotated to the specified GO term and children of that specified GO Term. Wild card queries (such as *ascospore*) are supported. Only manually curated and high-throughput GO annotations are included.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and (C or D) and (E or F) and (G or H) and (I or J)

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with GO term (and any children of this GO term):

query.name: GOTerm_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.description Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.qualifier Gene.status Gene.description Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.annotType Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.citation
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes annotated to a specified GO Term. Manually curated, high-throughput, and computational GO annotations are included.

template.name: GOname_GOidentifier
template.title: GO Term name --> GO Term Identifier.

query.name: GOname_GOidentifier
query.view: GOTerm.name GOTerm.identifier GOTerm.description GOTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Retrieve the GO term identifier (GOID) and description for a specified GO term name. Wild card queries (such as *ascospore*) are supported.

template.name: GOtermidentifier_name
template.title: GO Term identifier --> GO Term Name.

query.name: GOtermidentifier_name
query.view: GOTerm.identifier GOTerm.name GOTerm.description GOTerm.name GOTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Retrieve the GO term names and descriptions for a specified GO term identifier (GOID). Note that the query must contain either an entire identifier (such as GO:0007350) or the numerical value preceded by a wild card (such as *30437).

query.name: GeneFactor_GeneTarget
query.view: Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.symbol Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.regEvidence.ontologyTerm.name Gene.regulatoryRegions.regEvidence.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.experimentCondition Gene.regulatoryRegions.construct Gene.regulatoryRegions.strainBackground Gene.regulatoryRegions.regulationDirection Gene.regulatoryRegions.publications.pubMedId Gene.regulatoryRegions.datasource
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that are targets of a given regulator gene.

query.name: GeneTarget_GeneFactor
query.view: Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.symbol Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.regEvidence.ontologyTerm.name Gene.regulatoryRegions.regEvidence.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.experimentCondition Gene.regulatoryRegions.construct Gene.regulatoryRegions.strainBackground Gene.regulatoryRegions.regulationDirection Gene.regulatoryRegions.publications.pubMedId Gene.regulatoryRegions.datasource
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that are regulators of a given target gene.

query.name: Gene_ChromosomeLocation
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Retrieve the chromosomal location for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_Complements
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.shortName Gene.complements.complement.primaryIdentifier Gene.complements.complement.symbol Gene.complements.complement.organism.shortName Gene.complements.complement.crossReferences.identifier Gene.complements.complement.crossReferences.source.name Gene.complements.direction Gene.complements.publication.pubMedId Gene.complements.source Gene.complements.notes
query.longDescription: For a given yeast gene(s), retrieve information about cross-species functional complementation between yeast and another species.

query.name: Gene_Complex_New
query.view: Complex.name Complex.function Complex.systematicName Complex.allInteractors.participant.symbol Complex.allInteractors.participant.genes.briefDescription Complex.allInteractors.participant.secondaryIdentifier Complex.allInteractors.biologicalRole Complex.allInteractors.stoichiometry Complex.allInteractors.participant.genes.secondaryIdentifier Complex.allInteractors.type Complex.goAnnotation.id Complex.goAnnotation.qualifier Complex.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieve the complex details including other members that are part of the complex for a given gene.

query.name: Gene_CrossRefs
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.crossReferences.identifier Gene.crossReferences.source.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve external database identifiers (e.g. UniProtKB ID, E.C. #) for a specified S. cerevisiae gene.

template.name: Gene_FeatureType_Introns
template.title: All genes of a selected Feature Type-->Genes with introns

query.name: Gene_FeatureType_Introns
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.description Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes of a selected feature type that have introns.
query.constraintLogic: B and C and (D or E) and (F or G) and (H or I) and J

template.name: Gene_Flanking_Sequence
template.title: Gene --> Sequence Upstream and Downstream (+/-) Kb.

query.name: Gene_Flanking_Sequence
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.length Gene.flankingRegions.direction Gene.flankingRegions.sequence.length Gene.flankingRegions.sequence.residues
query.longDescription: For a given gene(s), get a chosen length of upstream and/or downstream sequence along with the gene sequence. Choose to retrieve 0.5 kb, 1.0 kb, or 2.0 kb of upstream or downstream flanking regions, or both. To retrieve only flanking regions without the coding sequence, select “false” for the “Gene Flanking Region > Include Gene” option (for this option, you must select only “upstream” or “downstream” flanking regions, not “both”).
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Gene_FungalHomologs
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.dataSets.dataSource.name Gene.homologues.homologue.briefDescription Gene.homologues.homologue.sgdAlias Gene.homologues.type
query.longDescription: Retrieve fungal homologs for a specified S. cerevisiae gene.

query.name: Gene_GO
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.withText Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.sgdDbXrefId
query.longDescription: Retrieve all GO annotations for a specified gene. Wild card queries (such as *YAL*) are supported. Manually curated, high-throughput, and computational GO annotations are included.
query.constraintLogic: (B or C) and (D or E) and F and A

query.name: Gene_GenomicDNA
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.organism.shortName Gene.sequence.length Gene.sequence.residues Gene.description Gene.qualifier
query.longDescription: Retrieve genomic DNA (DNA sequence with introns) for the specified gene.
query.constraintLogic: (A or B) and (C or D) and E

template.name: Gene_Homologs
template.title: Gene --> Non-Fungal and S. cerevisiae Homologs

query.name: Gene_Homologs
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve all TreeFam, PantherDB, Homologene homologs for a specified S. cerevisiae gene.

query.name: Gene_Interaction
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.interactions.details.annotationType Gene.interactions.details.phenotype Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.secondaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.identifier Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType
query.longDescription: Retrieve all interactions for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_Interaction_Single
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.interactions.details.annotationType Gene.interactions.details.phenotype Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.details.experimentType Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.gene2.secondaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve all interactions for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_Interaction_Single_1
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.interactions.details.annotationType Gene.interactions.details.phenotype Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.details.experimentType Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.secondaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType
query.longDescription: Retrieve all interactions for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_Introns
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that have introns.
query.constraintLogic: (A or B) and C and (E or F) and (G or H) and I

query.name: Gene_JasparClass
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.sgdAlias Gene.jasparAccession Gene.jasparFamily Gene.jasparClass
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that belong to a given JASPAR class.

query.name: Gene_JasparFamily
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.sgdAlias Gene.jasparAccession Gene.jasparFamily Gene.jasparClass
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that belong to a given JASPAR family.

query.name: Gene_Literature
query.view: Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.pubMedId Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.citation Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.year Gene.publicationAnnotations.literatureTopics.name Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve all references and literature topics associated with a specified gene.

template.name: Gene_OMIM_Disease
template.title: Yeast gene --> OMIM human homolog(s) --> OMIM Disease Phenotype(s)

query.name: Gene_OMIM_Disease
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.name Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.crossReferences.identifier Gene.homologues.homologue.diseases.identifier Gene.homologues.homologue.diseases.name Gene.homologues.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve human homolog(s) of yeast gene(s) and and any of their associated OMIM disease phenotypes.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Gene_OverlappingGenes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.qualifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.secondaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.qualifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Retrieve all overlapping genes. Caution: since the relationships are reciprocal, each gene in an overlapping pair has a separate line in the output file.
query.constraintLogic: A and C and G and B and D

constraint.value: not in systematic sequence of S288C
not in systematic sequence of S288C

query.name: Gene_Pathways
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.pathways.identifier Gene.pathways.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve all pathways in which the specified gene is involved.

query.name: Gene_Phenotype
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.qualifier Gene.phenotypes.experimentType Gene.phenotypes.mutantType Gene.phenotypes.observable Gene.phenotypes.qualifier Gene.phenotypes.allele Gene.phenotypes.strainBackground Gene.phenotypes.chemical Gene.phenotypes.condition Gene.phenotypes.details Gene.phenotypes.reporter Gene.phenotypes.publications.pubMedId Gene.phenotypes.publications.citation
query.longDescription: Retrieve all phenotypes for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_PredictedBindingSites
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.predictedBindingSites.numIntergenicSites Gene.predictedBindingSites.numIntragenicSites Gene.predictedBindingSites.pValue
query.longDescription: Retrieve number of predicted binding sites for a given transcription factor.

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.sgdAlias Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.pI Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.description Gene.proteins.sequence.residues
query.longDescription: Retrieve length, molecular weight, calculated pI and sequence for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_ProteinAbundance
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.abundance Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.gfpTagged Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.gfpVisualized Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.tapVisualized Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.localizedIn.site Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.publication.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieve protein abundance of the protein for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_ProteinMods
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.pI Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.modificationSite Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.modificationType Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.publication.pubMedId Gene.description Gene.proteins.sequence.residues
query.longDescription: Retrieve protein modifications of the protein for a specified gene.

template.name: Gene_ProteinMods_Ntermini
template.title: Gene --> Experimental N-termini and N-terminal modifications

query.name: Gene_ProteinMods_Ntermini
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.pI Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.experimentalNterminalSite Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.modificationType Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.experimentalNterminalSequence Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.category Gene.proteins.proteinModificationSites.publication.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieve N-terminal modifications of the protein for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_ProteinSequence
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.proteins.sequence.residues Gene.proteins.sequence.length Gene.featureType Gene.proteins.symbol
query.longDescription: Retrieve protein sequence for a specified gene.
query.constraintLogic: B and (A or C or D)

query.name: Gene_Protein_Domain
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.secondaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.name Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.description Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.interpro.name Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.interpro.description Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.description Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.start Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.end Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.evalue Gene.proteins.proteinDomains.method
query.longDescription: Retrieve domains identified in the protein encoded by the specified gene.

query.name: Gene_RegulationSummary
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.regulationSummary.summaryParagraph Gene.regulationSummary.publications.pubMedId Gene.regulationSummary.publications.citation
query.longDescription: Retrieve regulation summary and references for a regulator gene.

template.name: Gene_RegulationSummary_All
template.title: Retrieve all Regulators and their Summary Paragraphs

query.name: Gene_RegulationSummary_All
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.regulationSummary.summaryParagraph Gene.regulationSummary.publications.pubMedId Gene.regulationSummary.publications.citation
query.longDescription: Retrieve all Regulators and their Summary Paragraphs.

query.name: Gene_Single_Factor_Target
query.view: Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.symbol Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.regEvidence.ontologyTerm.name Gene.regulatoryRegions.regEvidence.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.experimentCondition Gene.regulatoryRegions.regulationDirection Gene.regulatoryRegions.publications.pubMedId Gene.regulatoryRegions.datasource
query.longDescription: Show info for a regulator<-->target pair.

query.name: Gene_SpellExpressionScores
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.organism.shortName Gene.expressionScores.score Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.conditionname Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.expressiondataset.name Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.expressiondataset.author Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.expressiondataset.title
query.longDescription: Retrieve expression data for a specified gene within the score range.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Gene_To_Protein_Type_Converter
query.view: Gene.id Gene.proteins.id

query.name: Gene_Topic_Literature
query.view: Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.pubMedId Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.citation Gene.publicationAnnotations.publication.year Gene.publicationAnnotations.literatureTopics.name Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve references associated with the selected literature topic for a given gene.

query.name: Gene_Transcript
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.symbol Gene.transcripts.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.transcripts.fivePrimeDataSet Gene.transcripts.threePrimeDataSet
query.longDescription: Retrieve transcript iso-forms for a given gene.

query.name: Gene_UTRs
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.symbol Gene.transcripts.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.transcripts.fivePrimeDataSet Gene.transcripts.threePrimeDataSet
query.longDescription:
Retrieve UTR location information for a given gene by taking the differences between the gene and transcript start locations and the gene and transcript end locations.
Transcripts are based on Pelechano et al, 2013; confirming dataset information is shown in ‘Transcripts Five Prime Data Set’ and ‘Transcripts Three Prime Data Set’ columns.

query.name: Gene_UpstreamIntergenic
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.primaryIdentifier Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.length Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Retrieve upstream intergenic region with its length and chromosomal location for a specified gene.

constraint.description: Show upstream intergenic region for gene:

query.name: Gene_YeastParalogs
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.secondaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.name Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.source Gene.homologues.publication.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieve paralogs for a specified S. cerevisiae gene(s).

template.name: Genes_Proteins_AbundanceRange
template.title: Retrieve-->Proteins in a given molecules/cell abundance range

query.name: Genes_Proteins_AbundanceRange
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.abundance Gene.proteins.proteinAbundance.publication.pubMedId Gene.proteins.pI Gene.featureType Gene.description Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that encode proteins of the selected molecular abundance.
query.constraintLogic: (C or H) and G and D and (E or F) and A and B

query.name: Genes_Proteins_Length
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.featureType Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.secondaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.pI Gene.proteins.length
query.longDescription: Retrieve length, molecular weight, calculated pI for a specified gene.
query.constraintLogic: (A or H or G or I) and B and C and D and (E or F)

template.name: Genes_Proteins_MolWt
template.title: Retrieve-->Proteins in a molecular weight range

query.name: Genes_Proteins_MolWt
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.pI Gene.featureType Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that encode proteins of the selected molecular weight range.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and (C or H or G or I) and D and (E or F)

query.name: Genes_Proteins_pI
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.featureType Gene.proteins.symbol Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.organism.shortName Gene.description Gene.proteins.pI
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes of a selected feature type that encode proteins of the selected calculated protein pI range.
query.constraintLogic: (A or H or I or J) and D and (E or F) and B and C

template.name: GenomeWide_Papers
template.title: Retrieve all Publications associated with genome-wide analysis topics.

query.name: GenomeWide_Papers
query.view: Publication.literatureTopics.name Publication.firstAuthor Publication.year Publication.pubMedId Publication.sgdDbXrefId Publication.title
query.longDescription: Show publications associated with genome-wide analysis topic both associated with and without a gene.

query.name: GoSlimTerm_Gene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.annotType Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.qualifier Gene.featureType
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes that are annotated to the selected GO Slim term and children of that selected GO Slim Term. Only manually curated and high-throughput GO annotations are included.
query.constraintLogic: (A or B) and (C or D) and (E or F) and G

query.name: HumaGene_YeastGene_Complement
query.view: Gene.complements.complement.symbol Gene.complements.complement.organism.shortName Gene.complements.complement.crossReferences.identifier Gene.complements.complement.crossReferences.source.name Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.organism.shortName Gene.complements.direction Gene.complements.publication.pubMedId Gene.complements.source Gene.complements.notes
query.longDescription: For a given human gene(s), enter gene name or Entrez GeneID and retrieve information about cross-species functional complementation between yeast and humans.

template.name: HumanGene_YeastHomolog_Disease
template.title: Human Gene -> Yeast Homolog(s) -> OMIM Disease Phenotype

query.name: HumanGene_YeastHomolog_Disease
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.crossReferences.identifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.secondaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.name Gene.diseases.identifier Gene.diseases.name Gene.homologues.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a given human gene(s) retrieve associated OMIM disease phenotype(s) and yeast homolog(s).
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Literature_GO
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.annotType Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.citation Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.title Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.journal Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias
query.longDescription: Retrieve GO annotations made from a specified PubMed ID (PMID).

query.name: Literature_Gene
query.view: PublicationAnnotation.genes.primaryIdentifier PublicationAnnotation.genes.secondaryIdentifier PublicationAnnotation.genes.symbol PublicationAnnotation.genes.sgdAlias PublicationAnnotation.genes.name PublicationAnnotation.publication.pubMedId PublicationAnnotation.publication.citation PublicationAnnotation.publication.year
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes curated to a PubMed ID (PMID).

query.name: Literature_Interaction
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.interactions.details.annotationType Gene.interactions.details.phenotype Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.citation Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.title Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.journal Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.secondaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.identifier Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType
query.longDescription: Retrieve all the interactions curated from the specified PubMed ID (PMID).

query.name: Literature_Interaction_1
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.interactions.details.annotationType Gene.interactions.details.phenotype Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.citation Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.title Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.journal Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.secondaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType Gene.interactions.details.experimentType
query.longDescription: Retrieve all the interactions curated from the specified PubMed ID (PMID).

query.name: Literature_Phenotype
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.phenotypes.publications.pubMedId Gene.phenotypes.experimentType Gene.phenotypes.mutantType Gene.phenotypes.observable Gene.phenotypes.qualifier Gene.phenotypes.allele Gene.phenotypes.strainBackground Gene.phenotypes.chemical Gene.phenotypes.condition Gene.phenotypes.details Gene.phenotypes.reporter Gene.phenotypes.publications.citation Gene.phenotypes.publications.title Gene.phenotypes.publications.journal Gene.sgdAlias Gene.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve phenotypes from a specified PubMed ID (PMID).

query.name: Organism_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.length Gene.qualifier Gene.sgdAlias Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.organism.name Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes, their chromosomal locations, nomenclature, sequence lengths, and descriptions, in the reference genome of S. cerevisiae
query.constraintLogic: (A or B) and (C or D) and E and F

query.name: Organism_IntergenicRegions
query.view: IntergenicRegion.primaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.length IntergenicRegion.chromosome.primaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.start IntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.end IntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.primaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.strand IntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.secondaryIdentifier IntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.symbol
query.longDescription: Retrieve all intergenic regions with their chromosomal locations, lengths and adjacent genes.

constraint.value: not in systematic sequence of S288C

query.name: Organism_Protein
query.view: Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.secondaryIdentifier Protein.symbol Protein.length Protein.molecularWeight Protein.pI Protein.genes.featureType Protein.genes.sgdAlias Protein.genes.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve length, molecular weight, calculated pI for all proteins encoded by the S. cerevisiae genes.
query.constraintLogic: A and (B or C) and D and (F or G or E or H)

constraint.description: Show all the proteins from the organism:

query.name: Pathway_Genes
query.view: Pathway.identifier Pathway.name Pathway.genes.secondaryIdentifier Pathway.genes.symbol Pathway.genes.sgdAlias Pathway.genes.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes that are involved in a specified pathway.

query.name: Phenotype_Genes
query.view: Phenotype.genes.primaryIdentifier Phenotype.genes.secondaryIdentifier Phenotype.genes.symbol Phenotype.genes.qualifier Phenotype.genes.sgdAlias Phenotype.experimentType Phenotype.mutantType Phenotype.observable Phenotype.qualifier Phenotype.allele Phenotype.strainBackground Phenotype.chemical Phenotype.condition Phenotype.details Phenotype.reporter Phenotype.publications.pubMedId Phenotype.publications.citation
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes that are annotated to a specified phenotype.

query.name: Protein_Aggregation
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.symbol Protein.proteinProperties.source Protein.proteinProperties.condition Protein.proteinProperties.location Protein.proteinProperties.isReversible Protein.proteinProperties.propertyName Protein.proteinProperties.publication.pubMedId

query.name: Publications_Literature
query.view: Publication.pubMedId Publication.citation Publication.title Publication.journal Publication.literatureTopics.name
query.longDescription: Retrieve publications associated with a specified topic.

query.name: Qualifier_ORF
query.view: ORF.primaryIdentifier ORF.secondaryIdentifier ORF.symbol ORF.sgdAlias ORF.featureType ORF.qualifier ORF.name ORF.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve ORFs of a specified qualifier type.
query.constraintLogic: A and (B or C) and D

query.name: SpellDataSet_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.sgdAlias Gene.expressionScores.score Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.conditionname Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.expressiondataset.author Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.expressiondataset.name Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.expressiondataset.pubmedID Gene.expressionScores.expressioncondition.expressiondataset.title
query.longDescription: Retrieve expression data by author name, PubMed ID, condition, or Dataset name. Queries can be further restricted by specifying an upper, lower or window of allowable expression scores. If querying by PubMed ID, condition, or Dataset name be sure to turn OFF the author option in addition to turning ON the option of interest. Results cannot be returned by specifying score alone.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E and F and G

constraint.description: use negative values for down-regulated genes
use negative values for down-regulated genes

template.name: gene_overlapping_flanking_regions
template.title: Gene-->Flanking features within a specific distance

query.name: gene_overlapping_flanking_regions
query.view: GeneFlankingRegion.gene.primaryIdentifier GeneFlankingRegion.gene.secondaryIdentifier GeneFlankingRegion.gene.symbol GeneFlankingRegion.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier GeneFlankingRegion.overlappingFeatures.secondaryIdentifier GeneFlankingRegion.overlappingFeatures.symbol GeneFlankingRegion.overlappingFeatures.featureType GeneFlankingRegion.direction GeneFlankingRegion.length
query.longDescription: Retrieve any annotated flanking features at least partially overlapping within a specified distance from the 5' or 3' end of a given gene.
query.constraintLogic: B and D and E and A and C

query.name: im_available_gene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol
query.longDescription: test if a specific gene is in mine

template.name: im_available_homologues
template.title: Homologue mapping query
template.comment: used for linking to other intermines

query.name: im_available_homologues
query.view: Gene.organism.shortName Gene.homologues.dataSets.name Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Returns organisms with orthologues and their datasets

template.name: im_available_organisms
template.title: All genes --> TaxonId
template.comment: used for displaying links to other intermines

query.name: im_available_organisms
query.longDescription: For all genes, list the taxonIds available. Used by webservice to construct links to other intermines.

query.name: im_gene_orthologue
query.view: Gene.organism.shortName Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol
query.longDescription: Used for intermine report pages. For a gene, return all orthologues

query.name: im_orthologue_converter
query.longDescription: used for mapping to other intermines

tag.name: im:frontpage
tag.objectIdentifier: Human genes complementing or complemented by yeast genes

tag.name: im:public
tag.objectIdentifier: Human genes complementing or complemented by yeast genes
